remarks: Proof induction for ~ en2i and related theorems.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 5-Jan-2016.)
statement:
enp1i.1 $e |- M e. _om $.
enp1i.2 $e |- N = suc M $.
enp1i.3 $e |- ( ( A \ { x } ) ~~ M -> ph ) $.
enp1i.4 $e |- ( x e. A -> ( ph -> ps ) ) $.
enp1i $p |- ( A ~~ N -> E. x ps ) $.
$d A x $.
$d N x $.
